renderpass.code:
/*
Multiple-Scattering Microfacet BRDF (GGX).

7.7 23: fix bsdf_eval_ggx_multi() which evaluate with wrong half vector.

Screen
    Left : multiple scattering ggx
    Right : single scattering ggx



Change settings from common tab.
    Supported sampling : MIS sampling, bsdf sampling, light sampling(nee)
      and white furnace test
      
    Lighting : Sky light, rectangle area light




All bsdfs here use Height-Correlated Masking and Shadowing.



bsdf implementation of
    d'Eon et al. 2023."Microfacet theory for non-uniform heightfields"
    It can produce 'hazy' highlight! 
    but not implement single/eval here. 



I'm not sure all math is correct.
if you found error, please report!!!

you can extend this with Beckmann NDF or diffuse surface...


refer to this paper and Supplemental Material
Heitz et al. 2016. "Multiple-Scattering Microfacet BSDFs with the Smith Model"

change variable. h -> z
Dupuy et al. 2016. "Additional Progress Towards the Unification of Microfacet and Microflake Theories"


*/




void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord) {
  vec4 radiance = texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(fragCoord), 0);
  
  fragColor = vec4(Gamma(ACESFilm(radiance.rgb / radiance.a)), 1.0);
  
}
